data.actual_result: The drag and drop animation is shown, but the upload image screen isnt shown
data.expected_result: Image is loaded and ready to be uploaded
data.short_description: Uploading an image direct from Chrome's browser download bar
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Chrome (not sure if its reproducable on other browsers) - Google search any image, then download it by right clicking on it and pressing save image - Once the image is downloaded, drag and drop it to Discord from the downloaded items bar at the bottom of chrome
